message.name: ERR_ATTACHMENT_FV_EMPTY_DESCRIPTION
message.locale: Please enter a description for the Attachment.

message.name: ERR_ATTACHMENT_FV_RECEIPTDATE_LATER_THAN_TODAY
message.locale: An attachment receipt date cannot be later than today.

message.name: ERR_ATTACHMENT_XRV_FILENAME_LOCATION_REFERENCE
message.locale: Either file location and reference or file attachment must be entered.

message.name: ERR_ATTACHMENT_XRV_FILENAME_OR_LOCATION_REFERENCE
message.locale: You should provide either file location and reference or file attachment but not both.

message.name: ERR_ATTACHMENT_FV_SENSITIVE
message.locale: You do not have access to this attachment's details.

message.name: ERR_ATTACHMENT_CANCEL_FAILED
message.locale: The cancellation of the embedded attachment failed with message, '%1s'.

message.name: ERR_ATTACHMENT_FV_MANDATORY_RELATED_OBJECT_TYPE
message.locale: The related object type must be selected.

message.name: ERR_ATTACHMENT_FV_MANDATORY_RELATED_OBJECT_ID
message.locale: The related object ID must be entered.
